name: SATORI
description:
Satori is a Hack & Slash Roguelike game with a third-person camera where a mask allows you to choose between different passive abilities and a ghost arm gives you different special abilities that you must use to fight against yokais and Japanese gods, all with a unique aesthetic. Cell Shading in three colors.
Satori consists of starting in a lobby, going through two rooms with simple enemies and finally reaching the boss room. Each enemy will give you coins that you can exchange in the lobby for new skills or character upgrades. If you die, you will always return to the lobby.
